w:group.name: Changes that could break older environments
w:group.w:entry: Use org.apache.log4j.Logger instead of org.apache.log4j.Category. Category has been deprecated for ~2 years and has been removed from the log4j code. Logger was introduced in log4j 1.2 so users of log4j 1.1 and log4j 1.0 need to upgrade to a newer version of log4j. .
